# 5P300-23-0111/B - HVAC Inspection, Testing and Maintenance Services - Pukaskwa National Park

**Tender Information:**

* **Reference Number:** 5P300-23-0111/B
* **Publication Date:** 2024-01-12
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-06T14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity:** Parks Canada
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Service Contract)

**Tender Description:**
Parks Canada invites bidders to provide HVAC Inspection, Testing and Maintenance Services for the Pukaskwa National Park. The contract is required for the period of March 1, 2024 to February 28, 2027, with two (2) one-year extension options.

**Security Requirement:**
The proposal includes a security requirement. New personnel security clearance requests will require mandatory fingerprints to initiate a criminal record check. The contractor is responsible for all associated costs.

**Site Visit:**
A site visit is recommended. The visit will take place at Pukaskwa National Park on January 23, 2024. Bidders must confirm attendance by January 22, 2024.

**Submission Guidelines:**
Bidders must submit their proposals via email to soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca or via fax to (877) 558-2349. Bids submitted via other means, including in-person delivery, will not be accepted. The maximum email file size is 15 MB. Multiple email submissions are allowed if necessary.

**Technical and Contractual Enquiries:**
Bidders can submit technical and contractual enquiries in writing to the Contracting Authority. Enquiries must be received no later than seven (7) calendar days prior to the tender closing date.

**Notice:**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Bidder's submissions must comply with the submission guidelines. Late submissions will not be considered.

**Attachments:**
Two attachments are available:

* 5P300-23-0111_appendix-a.pdf
* 5P300-23-0111b_rfq.pdf (English)
